articles.author: Julian Chokkattu
articles.title: Chromebooks Will Get Gemini and New Google AI Features - WIRED
articles.description: Google is bringing Gemini and a slew of AI-powered features to ChromeOS, and there are about seven new Chromebooks coming this year.
articles.content: The first notable feature is Help Me Write, which works in any text box. Select text in any text box and right-clickyou'll see a box next to the standard right-click context menu. You can ask Google'… [+2092 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Aurora Alert: Clear Your Diary For These Dates In June, Say Experts - Forbes
articles.description: There is potential for northern lights at low latitudes around June 6 due to sunspot AR3664 activity, but much uncertainty remains. Here's what you need to know.
